title: NSF CAREER: Wearable Biosensor Systems
description: Developing next-generation wearable biosensor systems for continuous health monitoring in everyday environments.

title: NIH: Non-invasive Glucose Monitoring
description: Developing non-invasive glucose monitoring technologies for diabetes management using advanced spectroscopy techniques.

title: Coulter Foundation: Lactate Monitoring Device
description: Translational research to develop a clinical lactate monitoring device for critical care applications.

title: UVA SRG: AI for Wearable Health Data
description: Exploring machine learning approaches for analyzing multi-modal wearable health data.
